attributes.action: Replace Phil Jupitus with Noel Fielding as a team captain on Never Mind the Buzzcocks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Phil Jupitus is good, Bill Bailey is better but I think we all agree that Noel is the most gorgeous and funny person to appear on Never Mind the Buzzcocks. I almost cried after the 3 recent espisodes with Noel Fielding ended. He should be permanent!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
